name: Don't Freeze (LucasSarubby)
description:
Help this burrito escape the refrigerator before he gets frozen!

A poor burrito that hasn't been eaten completely was left inside a refrigerator with bad company. Control him and find your way to the thermostat, fighting the cold foods that are trying to stop him, before he loses all his heat.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Don't Freeze is a game made by 4 people, all game design students, for the GMTK Jam within 48 hours.

Lucas Sarubby - Art

Marcel Hideki - Art

Patricia Sixel - Programming

Rafael Akio - Level Design

The Jam's theme was Dual Purpose Design.  Our approach to the theme was creating a movement that is also the attack.
